FuncDef: The display fr interface command displays information about FR interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type.
Currently, only POS interfaces are supported.

Examples: Pos1/0/0, DTE, physical down, protocol down
Pos2/0/0, DTE, physical up, protocol up
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about an FR interface, run the display fr interface command.
If no interface is specified, configurations about all FR interfaces are displayed.If interface is specified, information about the specified FR interface is displayed.

Prerequisites
Basic FR configurations have been complete.
